shrimp.name: SHWVelvet
shrimp.author: rconstruct
shrimp.usage: Based on Stephen H. Westin's velvet shader. This is meant to be used in a network with an ambient and diffuse terms. Note that Cs and Os aren't rsl_included, make proper arrangements in your shading network to consider them where desired. Ks controls overall intensity of effect. This block passes the resulting values to the aov_rimlighting and aov_scattering AOV presets.
